thumbro-desc: Improve and expand thumbnailing in MediaWiki
thumbro-invalid-file: Could not process requested file. Check that it exists on this wiki.
thumbro-invalid-width: Thumbnail width should be larger than zero and not larger than file width.
thumbro-invalid-sharpen: Sharpening amount should be a number larger than zero and smaller than five.
thumbro-thumb-error: libvips could not generate a thumbnail with given parameters.
thumbro-thumb-notscaled: libvips did not scale the thumbnail.
thumbro-thumbs-help: Move your mouse over the thumbnail to compare the thumbnails.
action-thumbro-test: use the libvips scaling test interface [[Special:ThumbroTest]]
right-thumbro-test: Use the libvips scaling test interface [[Special:ThumbroTest]]
